external_references.description: Accenture Security. (2018, April 23). Hogfish Redleaves Campaign. Retrieved July 2, 2018.
Matsuda, A., Muhammad I. (2018, September 13). APT10 Targeting Japanese Corporations Using Updated TTPs. Retrieved September 17, 2018.

objects.description: [menuPass](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0045) has used [certutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0160) in a macro to decode base64-encoded content contained in a dropper document attached to an email. The group has also used certutil -decode to decode files on the victim’s machine when dropping [UPPERCUT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0275).(Citation: Accenture Hogfish April 2018)(Citation: FireEye APT10 Sept 2018)
